title.narrative: Encouraging Climate Adaptation And Mitigation Investments Through Private Sector Engagement In Decentralised Wastewater Treatment Systems (Dewats) And Small-Scale Water Supply Infrastructure In Laos

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to demonstrate at the level of local communities, the business case and the contribution of decentralised water and energy systems to building resilience against climate induced water stress as well as its contribution to reduction of GHG emission in local communities.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

sector.narrative: Multisector aid for basic social services

title.narrative: Climate change resilience, sustainable livelihoods, health conditions, well-being and green growth increased in Southern Laos through investments in water, sanitation and energy infrastructure.

description.narrative: Climate change resilience, sustainable livelihoods, health conditions, well-being and green growth increased in Southern Laos through investments in water, sanitation and energy infrastructure.

title.narrative: The construction of water infrastructure have enabled local communities to be better prepared for climate-induced water stress, and GHG emissions has been reduced from local wastewater.
